result.execSummary:
The defendant Doretta K. Steuart was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Doretta K. Steuart

records.addlTxt: Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

Case called: 2:33 p.m. 
Clerk: Heather.      
State appears by ADA Jonathan Barnett; Defendant appears in person, pro se.
Date and time set for a plea hearing.

COURT reviews right to proceed without an Atty.
COURT accepts waiver of Atty, finds Defendant is freely, knowingly, and voluntarily waiving rights to Atty and finds Deft competent to represent herself. 

PLEA: 
CT 1 (Possession of THC - PTAC)>>GUILTY. 

COURT advises defendant of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & questions defendant to understanding; 
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, defendant is competent to represent self: a factual basis & defendant guilty;

COURT ORDERS: $50.00 fine plus CC and DNA surcharge; DNA sample; 60 days to pay or make arrangements. 


Adjourned: 2:43 p.m.
ADA Barnett appears; Deft appears pro se; Parties have an agreement; Waiver of right to attorney forms provided to deft;
Plea hearing on July 25, 2022 at 02:20 pm.
Pre-trial conference on June 24, 2022 at 10:40 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Doretta K. Steuart
Current: 512 S. 3rd Ave., Apt. #27, Wausau, WI 54401 United States  (Effective: 06-02-2022)
Prior: 411 N 7th Avenue, Wausau, WI 54401
Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.   Shall have his/her fingerprints and photograph taken at the Sheriff's Dept.

Case Called: 3:11 pm
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Jonathan Barnett in person.  Defendant appears in person, pro se.

VRCW.  
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 
PLEA:  NOT GUILTY.

BOND: 
$200 Signature Bond

CONDITIONS: 
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.  
- Prints and photograph. 

DATES:
PTC 06/24 @ 10:40 am
